name: Proactive Futures
overview:
Proactive Futures was started in 2002 to address the needs of the active daytraders migration into the futures markets trading e-mini contracts on the CME. The focus was to provide to provide direct access trading for active traders who demand low commissions, leading edge technology, and superior customer support.

ProActive futures specializes in direct access trading for both retail and institutional clients. We offer deep discount flat commission rates on futures and options and a full line of other services including online trading, broker assisted, proprietary, and CTA managed accounts as well as blackbox trading and automated systems trading.

ProActive believes that their should be no limit on investing in stable charting and execution platforms. As a result, we continue invest $ in leading edge execution platforms that are developed exclusively by traders, for traders that demand the best. ProActive offers multiple trading platforms: X_Trader, Ninjatrader, E-Z Trader , Trade Navigator, ProActive Direct, Strategy Runner, - RAN Order , Fire Tip and ProActive Pro.

ProActive is committed to providing our traders with a customer service team dedicated to satisfying the professional traders needs and wants. Our staff consists of current and former traders , so we understand what traders need. We provide 24 hour customer support and order desk, and much more.
